speaker.whylisten: Michael Stevens is an educator -- but when he answers questions, 3.2 million people tune in to hear the answer. That's because Stevens is the creator and host of Vsauce, an educational YouTube channel that addresses quirky but intriguing topics like "The Science of the Friend Zone" and "What Is Déjà vu?" Stevens has made a career feeding popular hunger for cool and interesting facts.
